flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to serve 5 shrimp per guest and will have 40 guests so he needs 5*40 = <<5*40=2000>>2000 shrimp
Each pound of shrimp has 20 shrimp and he needs 2000 shrimp so he needs 2000/20 = <<2000/20=100.0>>100.0 pounds of shrimp
The shrimp is $17.00 per pound and he needs 100.0 pounds so he will spend 17*100.0 = $<<17*100.0=1700.0>>1700.0 on shrimp

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 2000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
